attributes.action: consider free hearing tests for diabetic patients
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Research, recently published confirms
what many health professionals have long since suspected - a direct link between diabetes and hearing loss. Given this evidence, please consider
free screening and treatment for this at risk group, just as footcare and eye tests are already provided. Given rising diabetes, this fits in with the NHS Plan..
